sentences.en: He tried hard to vindicate his honor.
sentences.cn: 他拼命维护自己的名誉.

sentences.en: How would you vindicate your failure to your family?
sentences.cn: 你将如何向你家人解释你的失败?

sentences.en: I must vindicate a claim to philosophical reflectiveness.
sentences.cn: 我得作些哲理性的思考了.

sentences.en: Recent observations vindicate the assumption: a direct velocity - mass correlation is even tighter than the velocity - luminosity correlation.
sentences.cn: 最近的观测证实了这项假设: 速度与质量的直接关系甚至比速度与光度的关系更为紧密.

sentences.en: The charges are false, and we are sure we will be vindicated in court.
sentences.cn: 指控不实，我们确信法庭会证明我们是无辜的。

sentences.en: The decision to advertise has been vindicated by the fact that sales have grown.
sentences.cn: 销售增长的事实证明做广告宣传的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: There are times when wild rallies in high - flying stocks seem to vindicate the greater fool theory.
sentences.cn: 有时候,股票飙升,似乎违反了傻瓜理论.

sentences.en: Vindicate communal order, respect other people.
sentences.cn: 维护公共秩序, 不妨碍他人.

sentences.en: Vindicate the weak and fatherless; Do justice to the afflicted and destitute.
sentences.cn: 诗82:3你们当为贫寒的人和孤儿伸冤. 当为困苦和穷乏的人施行公义.

sentences.en: When we are being mistreated, we have the assurance that our God will vindicate us.
sentences.cn: 如果我们被错待, 我们可以满有把握地说:我们的神会为我们伸张正义.

sentences.en: You must stop imagining that posterity will vindicate you.
sentences.cn: 你可别以为后代会给你昭雪沉冤.

trans.tran_cn: 维护, 辩护, 表白
trans.tran_en: to prove that someone who was blamed for something is in fact not guilty

trans.tran_cn: 维护，证明…无辜，证明…正确，为…辩护
